publisher.publisher-name: Larousse et le Département de littérature française de l'université Paris-8

title-group.article-title: L'Éthique du biographique. Réflexions sur une tradition britannique

abstract.p: French anglicists have not shown much interest in literary biography, or biographies of writers by writers. Yet French criticism in general and Foucault in particular suggest the possibility of understanding the literary biography as an ethical space opened out between two dependent subjectivities, a tool with which to re-read biography differently.

p.mixed-citation: «Pour un retour à la vie de l'auteur: l'éthique du biographique», Études Anglaises, n° 3, 1999, Paris, Didier.
